name: Sweet Thai Chili Wings Recipe
description: An easy sweet Thai chili wings recipe, perfect as a crispy snack or appetizer. These can be served with or without a dipping sauce, with or with rice.
recipeIngredient: 2  prik chi fa (seeds removed, see notes)

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, blend garlic, water, prik chi fa chili (with seeds removed), and optionally some extra fresh chili peppers until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: In a food processor, blend garlic, water, prik chi fa chili (with seeds removed), and optionally some extra fresh chili peppers until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine tempura flour and rosdee seasoning powder. Slowly add ice-cold water, stirring continuously. Once mixed, let it sit for 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a mixing bowl, combine tempura flour and rosdee seasoning powder. Slowly add ice-cold water, stirring continuously. Once mixed, let it sit for 15 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Coat the chicken wings evenly in the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Coat the chicken wings evenly in the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok or deep fryer to 350°F (175°C). Fry the wings until they are crispy and golden, about 10–12 minutes. Make sure to turn them occasionally for even cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a wok or deep fryer to 350°F (175°C). Fry the wings until they are crispy and golden, about 10–12 minutes. Make sure to turn them occasionally for even cooking.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the wings out of the oil and let the excess oil drain off by placing them in a colander or on paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the wings out of the oil and let the excess oil drain off by placing them in a colander or on paper towels.

recipeInstructions.text: Over low heat, combine the chili paste from step 1, sugar, fish sauce, and oyster sauce in a pan or pot. Stir until the sugar has dissolved and the sauce thickens slightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Over low heat, combine the chili paste from step 1, sugar, fish sauce, and oyster sauce in a pan or pot. Stir until the sugar has dissolved and the sauce thickens slightly.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the crispy wings into the sauce. Toss them well to ensure they’re completely coated. Serve immediately while they’re still crispy. If desired, garnish with chopped green onions, sesame seeds, or coriander.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the crispy wings into the sauce. Toss them well to ensure they’re completely coated. Serve immediately while they’re still crispy. If desired, garnish with chopped green onions, sesame seeds, or coriander.

keywords: spicy chicken wings, spicy thai wings, sweet thai chili wings, thai sweet chili wings
